name: chainlink-mcp-server
description: Chainlink MCP Server providing comprehensive tools for CCIP, Data Streams, Functions, VRF, and Automation services
author: Chainlink Multi-Agent System

documentation.overview: This MCP server provides production-ready tools for interacting with all major Chainlink services including cross-chain interoperability (CCIP), high-frequency market data (Data Streams), serverless compute (Functions), verifiable randomness (VRF), and decentralized automation.

services.ccip: Cross-chain interoperability protocol for sending messages and tokens across blockchain networks
services.data_streams: Pull-based oracle solution providing high-frequency, low-latency market data
services.functions: Serverless platform for executing custom JavaScript code in a decentralized environment
services.vrf: Verifiable random function providing cryptographically secure randomness
services.automation: Decentralized automation network for triggering smart contract functions

documentation.usage: Each tool follows production standards with real API integrations, comprehensive error handling, and multi-blockchain support.
